results.title: Notes on SSH and AWS
results.content: connecting the aws service using bash on windows when bash, we should notice that program be run as administrator otherwise it will deny connection report 0555 code. root of ubuntu located "c:\users\scao7\appdata\local\packages\canonicalgrouplimited.ubuntuonwindows_79rhkp1fndgsc\localstateootfsoot" shadowsocks set up vpn 获取root权限 sudo -s 更新apt-get apt-get update 安装 python 包管理工具 pip install python-pip 安装shadowsocks 创建 目录 mkdir /etc/shadowsocks 创建并编辑我们的配置文件 vim /etc/shadowsocks/config.json wirte json file 配置服务器 ip，这里填写 0.0.0.0 "server":"0.0.0.0", 配置端口号及各自的密码 这里我用的多用户配置，大家也可以采用单用户配置 端口号如果不懂可以选择跟我相同的，密码修改为自己想设置的密码就好 "port_password":{ "20610":"mii**********qea" }, 超时时间 这个不用修改 "timeout":300, 加密算法 "method":"aes-256-cfb", true 或者 false 开启后能降低延迟 建议开启 "fast_open":false command 启动 ssserver -c -d start 停止 stop 重新启动 restart #check if server running ps -aux grep change security group add two more rule to port what you souce from 0.0.0.0/0 ::/0 best way connect have lot problems use putty instance. must instance with .pem file. first convert .ppk uplade under ssh -> auth. second copy dns form paste host name. open it. works fine. 18.04 solving problem error 如官网中所描述，这是由于在openssl 1.1.0中废弃了 evp_cipher_ctx_cleanup() 函数而引入了 eve_cipher_ctx_reset() 函数所导致的： evp_cipher_ctx was made opaque openssl 1.1.0. result, evp_cipher_ctx_reset() appeared disappeared. evp_cipher_ctx_init() remains an alias for evp_cipher_ctx_reset(). 因此，可以通过将 函数替换为 函数来解决该问题。具体解决方法如下： 1、根据错误信息定位到文件 /home/feng/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/shadowsocks/crypto/openssl.py 2、搜索 cleanup 并将其替换为 reset 3、重新启动 shadowsocks, 该问题解决。

results.title: Programming Language Design
results.content: problem description the task to build an interpreter for general purpose programming language of my own design. must support following features: comments integers strings dynamically typed (like scheme python) classes/objects arrays with o(1) access time conditionals recursion iteration convenient means command line arguments print console read from file adequate set operators anonymous functions as first-class objects (i.e. can be manipulated e.g. local functions) (graduate only) inheritance system detection variables used before definition only basic types you need provide are integer string do not methods coercing one type another (although may find it so). efficiency your particularly important, long solve test reasonable amount time. also does reclamation memory that longer needed. write program statically-typed, imperative such c, c++, java. check me first if wish use some other host language. bnf design style example: unary number variable left rule, right specific. syle describe how no-terminal broken down small pieces. lower case name non-terminal words, capitalized terminal words. grammar operator symbol define: quate """ assign "=" opren "(" cppren ")" obrace "{" cbrace "}" obraket "[ " cbraket "]" semicolon ";" colon ":" comma "," equals "==" notequals "!=" lesstan "<" greaterthan ">" lessorequal "<=" greaterorequal ">=" plus "+" times "*" divide "/" subtract "-" modulus "%" "&&" "||" caret "^" pound "#" "!" reserved keywords show goto else until call var func loop when expression cpren optexpression null condition greaterorequa oprator printexp functiondefexp functioncallexp variabledefexp list expressionlist optional *empty* statement loopstatment ifstatment statements parameter parameterlist optparameterlist function define block elsestatement return returnstatement project link continue! last revise 2⁄72019

results.title: webGL for Koch snowflake
results.content: problem description draw the koch snowflake using recursive method! calculate point for lines function calculatepoint(center, p){ var angleindegrees 60; angleinradians math.pi 180; s1 math.sin(angleinradians); c1 math.cos(angleinradians); x1 (p[0] center[0]) (p[1] center[1])* center[0]; y1 center[1]; vec2(x1,y1); return f; divide line into call recursively divideline(a, b,count) if(count === 0){ left; right; left mix(a,b,1/3); right mix(a,b,2/3); calculatepoint(left,right); drawline(a,left,f,right,b); else ab mix (a,b,0.3333); ba (b,a,0.3333); calculatepoint(ab, ba); count --; divideline(a,ab,count); divideline(ba,b,count); divideline(ab,v,count); divideline(v,ba,count); to snowfalke by calling divideline three times snowflake(a,b,c,count){ divideline(a,b,count); divideline(b,c,count); divideline(c,a,count); project link more coming!
